application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Acer - Deadwood (exempt).T.2 Holly - 1m Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.4 Holly - 50cm Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.5 Robinia - Deadwood (exempt).T.13 Holm Oak - 60cm Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.14  Robinia - Deadwood (exempt).T.17 Holm Oak - 60cm Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.18 Holm Oak - 60cm Holistic crown reduction to previous points.T.29 Robinia - 60cm Holistic crown reduction to previous points & deadwood.T.30 Cratageus - 1m reduction in height of leaders, reshape remaining crown, remove Jasmin growing within & deadwood.T.31 Gledistia - 1m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.33 Gleditsia - 1m reduction of leaders to suitable growth points where growing into Sorbus (T.34) & reshape.H.12 Conifer hedge -  40cm reduction, remove rose growing within & trim to shape (exempt).H.40 Taxus hedge - 30cm reduction, & trim to shape (exempt).G.41 Taxus - 1m Lateral reduction to suitable growth points & shape into upper crown.T.42 Quercus - 1.5m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points & deadwood.T.43 Olive - Remove 45cm of new growth to previous points.
